callback.name: Keyboard Controls
callback.desc: Change Controls for Player 1 and Player 2!

callback.name: Gamepad Controls
callback.desc: Change your controller controls, or... something.

menu.name: Gameplay
menu.desc: Change Gameplay options such as Downscroll, Scroll Speed, Naughtyness...

checkbox.name: Downscroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, notes will go from up to down instead of down to up, as if they're falling.

checkbox.name: Ghost Tapping
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, trying to hit any strum that have no note that can be hit will cause a miss.

number.name: Song Offset
number.desc: Changes the offset that songs should start with.

checkbox.name: Naughtyness
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, will censor the Week 7 cutscenes

checkbox.name: Camera Zoom On Beat
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, will stop the camera from zooming in every 4 beats

menu.name: Appearance
menu.desc: Change Appearance options such as Flashing menus...

checkbox.name: Antialiasing
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, will disable antialiasing on every sprite. Can boost performances at the cost of sharper, more pixely sprites.

checkbox.name: Colored Healthbar
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, the game will use the orginal red/green health bar from the week 6 fnf game.

checkbox.name: Pixel Perfect Effect
checkbox.desc: If checked, Week 6 will have a pixel perfect effect to it enabled, aligning every pixel on the screen.

checkbox.name: Gameplay Shaders
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, gameplay shaders (visual effects like Thorns's Chromatic Aberration) wont be loaded; this may be helpful on weak devices.

checkbox.name: Flashing Menu
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, will disable menu flashing when you select an option in the Main Menu, and other flashes will be slower.

checkbox.name: Low Memory Mode
checkbox.desc: If checked, will disable certain background elements in stages to reduce memory usage.

checkbox.name: VRAM-Only Sprites
checkbox.desc: If checked, will only store the bitmaps in the GPU, freeing a LOT of memory (EXPERIMENTAL). Turning this off will consume a lot of memory, especially on bigger sprites. If you aren't sure, leave this on.

checkbox.name: Auto Pause
checkbox.desc: If checked, switching windows will pause the game.

menu.name: Miscellaneous
menu.desc: Use this menu to reset save data or engine settings.

callback.name: Reset Save Data
callback.desc: Select this option to reset save data. This will remove all of your highscores.
